entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow mixed with rain. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this morning. 60 percent chance of light snow or rain this morning and early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 06:01 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then periods of snow. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 06:01 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:01 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
